author: Pamela Muse
text:
We are working on revising our City Shuttle Vehicle Policy for employees.  Please send copies of your policies ASAP. 
Also, if you know of any state mandates that requires the city to provide employees transportation to work from public transit.
Thank you in advance.
Karena McGee Shackelford
City of Fremont, CA 
KShackelford@fremont.gov  
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: City Shuttle Policy for Employees
